channel.description: Recent content in REST on tedn.life

item.title: RESTful Services - Dana Gardner, Adrian Trenaman, Roland Tritsch - wrapping it up
item.description: The Webinar went very well. I think we had over 50 poeple that showed up. The archived webinar and the source code will be available on open.iona.com. Check it out.

item.title: RESTful Services - Dana Gardner, Adrian Trenaman, Roland Tritsch
item.description: Everybody is talking about REST. We do too :). Join us on July, 15th for this existing Webinar on REST and RESTful Services. Will include a live demo of a RESTful iPhone integration. CU there.
